data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Saraikela-kharsawan words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Saraikela-kharsawan, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Saraikela-kharsawan, Jharkhand, India to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary: On average, 86 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Saraikela-kharsawan, Jharkhand, India.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Saraikela-kharsawan, Jharkhand, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Saraikela-kharsawan, Jharkhand, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Sekera people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Sekera people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Sekera people is yours.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Saraikela-kharsawan, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Saraikela-kharsawan that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Saraikela-kharsawan, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
